description: {"blocks":[{"key":"8ckq7","text":"HiBit is an 11 amino acid protein tag that binds with high affinity to a larger subunit called LgBit. The bound complex has luciferase activity and will release luminescent signal in the presence of added furimazine substrate. HiBit is highly quantitative, extremely sensitive, and much faster than conventional immunoassays. When added to C-terminus of protein/peptide, the luminescence from tag ensures entire construct has been translated. The tagged protein/peptide is incubated with patient sera and antibody/antigen complexes are captured with protein A/G beads. Luminescence of captured complexes is measured. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"32dpl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"9t4gc","text":"SLBA buffer (1L) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71cs4","text":"30ml of 5M NaCl ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7u8pd","text":"10ml of 2M Tris-HCl pH7.4","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"co6ct","text":"1g sodium azide ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ej948","text":"1g BSA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mbtn","text":"1.5ml Tween-20 ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ajnvi","text":"Bring the volume up to 1000ml and filtered using 0.2 micron filter. Store the buffer at 4C in a sterile bottle for up to 3 months. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2q5a1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d2h03","text":"Sepharose Protein A and Protein G beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7038j","text":"Add equal volume of Protein A (Millipore Sigma GE17-5280-02) and Protein G (Millipore Sigma GE17-0618-05)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2ovba","text":"Wash beads 3x with SLBA buffer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a94o9","text":"Resuspend in 1 volume packed beads (e.g. packed beads are 10mL after washing, bring total volume up to 20mL with SLBA buffer)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hmbm","text":"Keep prepared beads at 4C for up to 1 month","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"18ecr","text":" {"blocks":[{"key":"33hlh","text":"Add 1-5ul of serum to antigen+buffer ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cklar","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1kj36","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"20s4l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8r20i","text":"Determine optimal amount of serum input experimentally ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6pdac","text":"Orbital shake 15 min 500rpm at 4C, incubate overnight 4C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cc42p","text":"Block the 0.2um PVDFFilter 96-well Plates PVDF plate with 200ul of RLBA buffer overnight at RT","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fi6nf","text":"Remove wash buffer from blocked PVDF plates by placing on vacuum manifold, seal bottom of plate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cns77","text":"Using wide bore P200 tips, add 25ul of beads/well (1:1 protein A:G; SLBA buffer to beads should be 1:1 ratio) to filter plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8s9do","text":"Add 55ul of serum + Ag mix to each well that contains the beads","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3gval","text":"Seal the plate with foil cover and orbital shake (500rpm) in the cold room for 45mins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aaf77","text":"Place PVDF plate on vacuum fold with gentle vacuum to remove unbound antigen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7bjdd","text":"Add 200ul of SLBA buffer to each well, repeat for a total of 3 washes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6voiu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqdcb","text":"Add 150uL SLBA buffer. Seal the bottom plate with foil cover. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eiq8v","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"511ot","text":"Orbital shake (500rpm) for 5 mins at 4C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"elknu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4m3mn","text":"Connect the vacuum seal and wash it with 200ul of SLBA buffer, repeat for a total of 3 washes","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rpej","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"33o27","text":"Release the pressure after wash and put the paper towel on the vacuum seal and applied pressure to remove excess fluid. Do it until almost little buffer are seen on the paper towel from the vacuum pressure. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"37vmj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7khiq","text":"Gently place a white seal on bottom of plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ruk2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"776gn","text":"Resuspend beads in 50uL SLBA buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3as7l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4dmk6","text":"Add 50uL luciferase reagent (prepared as above) to each well, mix","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gv7m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"74oc2","text":"Incubate 1h room temperature in the dark","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"87aam","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"erg0n","text":"Read counts using luminometer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Split Luciferase Binding Assay (SLBA) Protocol
